summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Khairat Al Ardh Operations Management System. Backend API testing achieved 95.2% success rate (20/21 tests passed). Frontend testing successfully validated Arabic RTL UI, authentication, navigation, and all CRUD operations across equipment, production, expenses, invoices, and attendance management modules.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 400 'Costing center already exists' when trying to create duplicate center
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - expected behavior for duplicate prevention

design_issues.issue: Logout button timeout in some test scenarios

passed_tests: API Health Check (root and health endpoints)
Production Management with completion rate calculations
Expense Management with categories and filtering
Real-time data synchronization between frontend and backend
